channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- BigFix Server Automation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- BigFix Server Automation

item.title: CVE-2022-38658|2024-08-03T11:02:14.401Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20server%20automation
item.description: BigFix deployments that have installed the Notification Service on Windows are susceptible to disclosing SMTP BigFix operator's sensitive data in clear text. Operators who use Notification Service related content from BES Support are at risk of leaving their SMTP sensitive data exposed.
